alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Beaver and Texas Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 924 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms and the resulting outflow boundary along a line extending from Big Bow to near Cave to 9 miles north of Plains to 6 miles north of Fowler to near Ford. Movement was south at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Beaver, Hooker, Goodwell, Tyrone, Forgan, Optima, Hardesty, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Hough, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin and Slapout. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
